common.framework.dsb.proxy

接口 ServiceProxy

  • 所有超级接口:
    java.rmi.Remote
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultServiceProxy

    public interface ServiceProxy
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Remote interface for dynamic service interpreting.
    作者:
    David Yuan

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close service proxy
      boolean closeService(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Close service with specified name: servieName
      void closeSession(java.lang.String sessionID)
      Close session when finished to transfer the whole file data to server.
      java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String method, java.lang.Class[] paramTypes, java.lang.Object[] args)
      Invoke remote dynamic service.
      java.util.List<ServiceDescriptor> listService()
      List all available dynamic services
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> listStartedService()
      Get all started services
      LookupResult lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Lookup dynamic service descriptor by service name.
      java.lang.String openSession(java.lang.String jarName)
      Open upload session.
      void ping()
      Heart beat checking.
      boolean refreshService(java.lang.String servieName)
      Refresh service with specified name: servieName
      void start(java.util.List<java.lang.String> startupServices, java.util.List<java.lang.String> disabledServies)
      Start service proxy
      boolean startService(java.lang.String serviceName)
      Start service with specified name: serviceName
      void upload(java.lang.String sessionID, byte[] data, int length)
      Upload dynamic service jar file to server

          throws java.lang.Exception

      • invoke

        java.lang.Object invoke(java.lang.String serviceName,
                      java.lang.String method,
                      java.lang.Class[] paramTypes,
                      java.lang.Object[] args)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoke remote dynamic service.
        参数:
        serviceName - dynamic service name
        method - method name
        paramTypes - parameter types of this method
        args - arguments
        返回:
        the returned object
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup

        LookupResult lookup(java.lang.String serviceName)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Lookup dynamic service descriptor by service name.
        参数:
        serviceName - the name of dynamic service
        返回:
        service LookupResult
        抛出:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                    java.rmi.RemoteException

      • upload

        void upload(java.lang.String sessionID,
          byte[] data,
          int length)
            throws java.lang.Exception,

        Upload dynamic service jar file to server
        参数:
        sessionID - session ID
        data - file data
        length - the length of data
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
